name: Cubion
description:
Symbiosis of styles "shoot'em up" and "flappy bird". Completely randomly generated obstacles and enemies. As well as various bonuses.
There are three game modes. x1 normal game mode. x2 and x3 increase the speed of the game and speed up the set of points in 2 and 3 times, respectively.
Make the maximum number of points and be the first
